Feature updates: After your friend successfully registers through your invitation link both you and your friend can receive a 3 day premium membership experience reward. Come and invite your friends to register Notta.

new function 1. Guest mode is online: you can start trying Notta without registration. 2. Import audio files for transcription: You can import audio files and view the transcription results of the first 5 minutes for free. Function optimization 1. Dispatch robots to participate in and automatically transcribe video conferences: Supports modifying the default name of robots participating in Microsoft Teams video conferences.
Feature updates: Zoom meeting url links without passwords can also be used to automatically record and transcribe online meetings. Other issues and user experience optimization.

Major feature updates: 1. Speaker recognition function is online: audio and video file transcription can identify the speaker in the transcription results and mark the recognition results above each text fragment if speaker recognition is selected to start the time to obtain the file transcription results will be longer . 2. Users can edit the speaker name for the text fragments of the transcription results of file transcription online meeting transcription and real time recording transcription making it easy to note the speaker name of the transcribed text. 3. Users can use the Apple widget function to quickly start recording transcription by long pressing the application icon on the homepage. Function optimization: 1. Optimized the function of exporting transcribed text to Notion.

new features: 1. Free users can share Notta with others and receive 3 day trial membership rewards with a maximum of 20 rewards. Users can learn the progress of file transfer on the list page

Major feature updates: 1. Supports Zoom Google Meet and Microsoft Teams meeting transcription. Just fill in the meeting link and Notta Bot can be dispatched into the meeting for real time transcription. View the transcribed text in real time and mark key points so you no longer miss the details of every meeting. ! 2. Conference transcription results show the speaker: When you use Zoom Google Meet and Microsoft Teams for conference transcription Notta Bot can distinguish the speaker for you and enrich the text information. 3. Export style customization: Supports custom operations such as display hide of transcription result time speaker information export merging adjacent speaker paragraphs full text merging etc. The export style is up to you 4. Optimize the file list style and the file sharing status is clear at a glance!
Fixed known issues and optimized some operating experiences.

Some new features have been added: 1. Recording voiceprint display 2. Merge multiple pieces of content 3. Lists and text support long press operation 4. The file list supports long press or sliding sharing Fixed the issue where Bluetooth keyboard cannot be used on iPad

Non subscribers can record normally after 3 minutes. Users can turn on off the sharing of corresponding record details on the app side. Come and share it with your friends. Multiple blocks in the record details support the merge operation after selection making it easier to merge the operation text with one click!

1. You can automatically switch between day and night mode themes in the Notta app bringing a better user experience. 2. The global search function in the app is online. You can search all records under the account on the homepage and click on the session details to locate key information. 3. Robots can be dispatched to participate in Zoom meeting transcriptions within the app: Click on the homepage to send the robot to participate in a Zoom meeting that has already started and the complete transcription results will be obtained after the meeting.
Fixed known issues in file transcoding Optimize user experience in recording transcription
The Notta app is now available on iPad. You can now select multiple records or phrases at once by swiping up or down on the home page or record details screen.

1. UI design revision 1. Select the new logo style of notta app through user participation 2. The theme color of notta app has been modified from malachite green to technology blue making the overall presentation neater and brighter. 3. Added day and night mode theme switching providing richer user options Delay 4. Modified the CTA display format of the notta app login registration page. 5. Visually highlight the third party login of notta app s login registration page 6. Modified the illustration style in notta app 7. Optimized the information presentation form of notta web official website page 2. UX design optimization 1. More convenient text operations: The sliding operation method is introduced to facilitate the operation of modular transcribed text. One click support for transcribed text: copy share insert pictures and mark key points. 2. More humane audio operation: 3 seconds of fast positioning assisting with fast audio marking during recording allowing users to quickly locate the key points of the audio 3. Faster adding recording operations: Unify the entrances for imported audio transcription quick recording real time transcription and language selection transcription and use CTA to guide users to complete the naming of recording files. 4. More obvious user identity: Introducing the mine interaction design to intuitively feel user information including membership status 5. Convenient folder management: switch folders on the homepage eliminating redundant operations. 6. Enhance the visual connection between audio text introduce vertical screen corresponding interaction mode and intuitively display the concept of audio as text 7. Modified the live broadcast technique of real time transcription of recordings to guide users to live text live sharing 8. Modified the follow up logic of sharing and revealed the notta brand through link splicing to facilitate subsequent customer acquisition. 9. Optimized the interactive operation of translation and guided users to perform text post translation 10. Before the user s recording operation manage expectations and guide the user to perform effective recording transcription. 11. Simplified the display of audio status on the homepage during business operations 12. When adding pictures the photo taking and album selection operation pages are integrated into one making it easy to add pictures. 3. Revision of core functions 1. Revision of notta web subscription page to maintain uniform prices across multiple terminals 2. The recording focus and audio marking functions are combined into one text focus which intuitively reflects the connection between text and audio. 3. Remove the original junior membership rights and retain the senior membership rights. 4. Changes in guided rating logic: trigger reviews in details and guide users to go to the app store to give good reviews and high ratings 5. Remove the activity center and replace it with local information flow promotion 6. Optimized the management operation of the audio list you can add delete modify text key types and support one click export of key text 7. Save the edited text in real time and flexibly withdraw the operation without worrying about losing the edited text. 4. Unlimited use of rights 1. The real time transcription function can be used after registration without paying. 2. New feature: text focus free trial without payment 5. Detailed instructions for use introducing the security terms of relevant data use and indicating our information 1. Updated Xinhua Help Center documentation including FAQs and app usage instructions 2. After registration the novice guidance function has been revised. Users can intuitively experience the core functions of the product by operating the demo and watch it repeatedly. 3. Modify the privacy agreement and instructions for use 4. The home page reveals the entrance to frequently used function descriptions guiding users to click to learn more. 5. Added a page showing subscription FAQs 6. More user friendly feedback support operation 6. Multi terminal support operation 1. Microsoft Edge 浏览器的适配支持
